forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Scattered Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 75, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. Northwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
